pages.text: The end set of Buddycards is quite difficult to find in vanilla, but quite simple in endgame. There are 27 cards in this set in total, but many more when you consider shiny variants and grades. $(br2)In order to get end set cards, you must find end set packs.

pages.title: End Set Packs
pages.text: End set packs can be found most commonly by killing the dragon, as he is guaranteed to drop a few. $(br2)You can also find packs when raiding end cities, both in chests and rarely as a drop from shulkers.

pages.title: End Set Cards
pages.text: The end set packs, as with most packs, will give you 4 cards in total, with only one of them being a shiny variant. $(br2)The cards come in four rarities: common, uncommon, rare, and epic. You can tell them apart by the colors of their corners.

pages.title: End Set Cards
pages.text: 1-12 號牌是普通卡，沒有彩色角，13-21 號是罕見卡，有2個黃色角，22-25 號是稀有卡，有4個藍色角，26和27號是史詩卡，有2個黃色和2個紫色角。閃光卡和非閃光卡稀有度的機率相同。

pages.title: End Set Medal
pages.text: The end set medal can be earned by getting all 27 cards, shiny and not shiny, of the end set. When equipped, it will give you Resistance I.

pages.title: 勳章附魔
pages.text: The medal can also be enchanted with Buddy Binding and Buddy Boost. Both levels will clear you of levitation every few seconds, and Buddy Boost II will upgrade your Resistance I to Resistance II.
